bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: "Illegal instruction" when using tensorflow on SciServer Compute
bug.description: When running the CIFAR10 example, the following error is thrown: <denchmark-code>ERROR conda.cli.main_run:execute(32): Subprocess for 'conda run ['python', 'main.py']' command failed. (See above for error) /home/idies/miniconda3/envs/deepforge/.tmpt3a3veq5: line 3: 812 Illegal instruction (core dumped) python main.py </denchmark-code>
